jobDetails: Work alongside the developers to help develop and perform integration tests to ensure code meets the defined acceptance criteria.
Assist other developers with debugging, or additional testing as required.
Work  with  the  product  team  to  understand/clarify  feature  requirements,  and  implement  solutions  to develop software functionality.
Created Python scripts to discover tens-of-thousands of daily infringing copyright video links.
Added search and UI features to our script managing app to ease developer and analyst workload.
Built and tested scraping features for a Google Chrome extension to automate DMCA take down notices.
Hosted the discovery teamâ€™s retrospective meetings to improve team productivity and efficiency.
Converted UI designs in Figma to HTML to attract potential customers to use our delivery services.
Tested web pages with multiple browsers and devices to ensure web pages were cross-platform friendly.
Assessed the usability of our web app with system tests to improve the customer's browsing experience.
